name: THE BUNNYKILLINATOR
description:
Made for 'So Bad it's Good' Jam 2022

Once upon a time the tortoises and the rabbits had an argument about whose race was superior

The argument ended with the tortoises massacring the rabbits with the BUNNYKILLINATOR. A lesson that the rabbit's kin will remember forever.

Annihilate the rabbits with the power of the BUNNYKILLINATOR, and bathe in the blood of the bunnies that once mocked the tortoise race!

Controls:

S - stomp

A - left

D - right

Controller support included!

Music used:

Rip and tear(DOOM 2016 OST) : Mick Gordon
